ok, I have ref for the new atis
clt-alt-backspace, ctl-alt-f2 , login.  sudo invoke-rc.d gdm stop (this stops your X server. Do the install, then  sudo invoke-rc.d gdm start to restart X server
you can use clt-alt-f2 and clt-alt-f7 to switch back and forth while the X server is running
